attributes.action: Include the winter fuel benefit to all those receiving income support.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pensioners as a right receive a payment to assist them with their winter fuel bills. But another part of society no less worthy   are living on the breadline. 

We believe that those people at the very bottom of the social scale, during a time of the incredibly steep rise in energy cost's should receive a payment similar to that which pensioners already enjoy. The cost could and many believe should be raised by a windfall tax on the unbelievable rise in profits by the energy suppliers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
